questions.q1-question: 선호하는 캐릭터 성별이 있나요? (로아의 많은 직업군은 성별이 정해져 있습니다)
questions.q2-question: 클래스에 많은 시간/돈을 투자할 생각이 있으신가요? (주관적)
questions.q3-question: 다음 중 제일 즐거울 것 같은 일은 무엇인가요?
questions.q4-question: 파티에 어떠한 방식으로 특수기여를 하고 싶으신가요?
questions.q5-question: 최대 데미지를 넣기 위해선 몬스터의 등/머리를 공격해야 한다면?
questions.q8-question: 기본체방이나 스킬 등을 통해 직업에 내재된 생존률을 중요하게 생각하시나요?
questions.q10-question: 내 직업에 대한 다른 사람들의 인식/티어를 중요하게 생각하시나요? (주관적, PvE기준)
questions.q12-question: 글로벌 서버이신 경우, 현재 한국에서만 플레이 가능한 직업 추천도 괜찮으신가요?

answers.costly-only: 저는 고자본 캐릭터를 하고 싶습니다, 고자본 캐릭터를 우선해 주세요
answers.frugal-only: 저는 무/저자본 캐릭터가 하고 싶습니다. 무/저자본 캐릭터를 우선해 주세요
answers.frugal-prefer: 무/저자본 캐릭터가 좋지만, 취향이 맞다면 돈을 쓸 의향이 있습니다
answers.damage-prioritize: Dealing the most damage on the party
answers.tank-prioritize: Staying alive until the end of a difficult raid
answers.support-only: Saving teammates from their mistakes and giving important buffs
answers.stagger-prioritize: Stagger - Purple gauge under the health that stuns the boss when depleted
answers.weakpoint-prioritize: Weak Point - Break off armor and shields to do more damage/start depleting the stagger bar
answers.counter-prioritize: Counter - Counters and stuns the boss before he attacks
answers.utility-allrounder-prioritize: I wish I had a bit of everything - or a lot of everything
answers.backhead-prioritize: That sounds amazing, prioritize classes with the back/head mechanic
answers.backhead-prefer: I would prefer classes that have this mechanic
answers.hitmaster-prioritize: That sounds horrible, prioritize classes withOUT the back/head mechanic
answers.hitmaster-prefer: I would prefer classes without this mechanic
answers.nuke-prioritize: Strongly prefer nuking mobs through one or two skills that have big oomph
answers.nuke-prefer: Prefer nuking mobs through one or two skills that have big oomph
answers.const-prioritize: Strongly prefer constantly rotating through my skills for consistent damage
answers.const-prefer: Prefer constantly rotating through my skills for consistent damage
answers.cycle-allrounder-prioritize: Strongly prefer a class that has a little bit of both
answers.cycle-allrounder-prefer: Prefer a class that has a little bit of both
answers.range-midlong-prioritize: Strongly prefer a class with mid-long range
answers.range-midlong-prefer: Prefer a class with mid-long range
answers.range-midshort-prioritize: Strongly prefer a class with short-mid range
answers.range-midshort-prefer: Prefer a class with mid-long range
answers.survivability-high-prioritize: Strongly prefer a class with high survivability
answers.survivability-high-prefer: Prefer a class with high survivability
answers.survivability-midhigh-prioritize: Strongly prefer a class with at least some extra survivability
answers.survivability-midhigh-prefer: Prefer a class with at least some extra survivability
answers.survivability-neutral: Please prioritize other traits over survivability / Skip question
answers.mobility-high-prioritize: Strongly prefer a class with high mobility
answers.mobility-midhigh-prioritize: Strongly prefer a class with at least decent mobility
answers.mobility-low-prioritize: Strongly prefer a less mobile class
answers.mobility-neutral: Please prioritize other traits over mobility / Skip question
answers.tier-high-prioritize: Tier 1 classes - top rated characters, high raid demand
answers.tier-mid-prioritize: Tier 2~4 - great characters that may have some flaws
answers.tier-low-prioritize: Tier 5 - characters with glaring flaws that may impair the ability to find a raid party
answers.difficulty-high-prioritize: Recommend me classes with challenging gameplay
answers.difficulty-low-prioritize: Recommend me easier classes to start getting used to Lost Ark with
answers.difficulty-neutral: I don't have a strong preference on class difficulty / Skip question
answers.global-only: Only recommend me classes currently available globally
answers.global-prioritize: I would like an emphasis on classes currently available globally
answers.global-neutral: Yes, recommend me all potential classes / I am on the Korea server
